sentences.en: " The Classics on Tea " , written by Lu Yu of the Tang Dynasty ( 618 A . D . - 907 A . D . ) was the world's earliest treatise on tea leave production.
sentences.cn: 中国唐代陆羽写的《茶经》是世界上最早的茶叶制作专著.

sentences.en: A new applied forge die is presented in the treatise.
sentences.cn: 给出实用的新型锻模结构.

sentences.en: An anthropologist wrote a treatise on some of these fables.
sentences.cn: 一位人类学家写了一部关于这些寓言的专著.

sentences.en: Aristotle wrote a treatise on literature called his Poetics.
sentences.cn: 亚里士多德写了一本名为《诗学》的文学作品.

sentences.en: His theories have been reduced in a popular treatise.
sentences.cn: 他的各种理论被总括在一篇通俗的论文中.

sentences.en: I just finished read a treatise on the new technology.
sentences.cn: 我刚刚读完一篇有关这项新技术的文章.

sentences.en: My professor contributed his treatise to a famous academic periodicals.
sentences.cn: 她的证据对逮捕他起了很大的作用.

sentences.en: Problems of this type are not included in the present treatise.
sentences.cn: 这类问题不包括在本文中.

sentences.en: The doctor wrote a treatise on alcoholism.
sentences.cn: 那位医生写了一篇关于酗酒问题的论文.

sentences.en: The most notable legal treatise in the century is Littleton's Tenures.
sentences.cn: 该世纪最著名的法学著作是利特力顿的《土地使用》.

sentences.en: The treatise on current affairs skimmed the surface of the subject.
sentences.cn: 那篇讨论时事的文章只触及了问题的皮毛.

sentences.en: The work at hand is not a theoretical treatise.
sentences.cn: 这本著作不是一篇理论性的论文.

sentences.en: This book is not a treatise on brain tumor pathology and nosography.
sentences.cn: 这本书不是关于大脑瘤病理学和疾病记述学的一篇论文.

sentences.en: This is not a treatise on statistical theory.
sentences.cn: 这不是一篇有关统计理论的论文.

sentences.en: This text treatise trespass on computer information system crime made system.
sentences.cn: 本文对非法侵入计算机信息系统罪作了系统的论述.

trans.tran_en: a serious book or article about a particular subject
